overview: Life's a bitch when your girlfriend doesn't put out. Love is put to the test as Lulu survives to keep her virginity in tact. With all the horny hot cocks out there, there is no telling how Lulu and the other beauties will react. Like they say, "Sharing is caring." For this cast, they have no problems with that. Andrea Lucienne has directed a masterpiece. Her models give it all for her!
tagline: Lulu Is Vain, Lulu Is Mischievous, Lulu Is Touchy, Lulu Is A Babe Full of Desire.
title: Lulu
